The Pixel Kingdom is in peril and Pip is the only pixel tough enough to save it! Adventures of Pip revitalizes the classic side-scrolling action platform genre. Those same pixels can then be used to blast through environment puzzles and enemies, devolving Pip back to a single pixel. Players will explore five stylized worlds and experience up to 10 hours of epic adventure saving PipÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s village from the evil Skeleton Queen.

Inspired by classics such as Super Mario Bros.,Donkey Kong Country, Kid Icarus, and Legend of Zelda, Adventures of Pip basks in a world where players can defeat a huge 32-bit boss as a single pixel or even as an 8-bit character.

With three different forms, evolve and devolve Pip to solve puzzles and defeat enemies; each with their own weakness and strength that must be unraveled throughout the campaign.

STORY
The Bit Stream is the life force that fuels Pixel Kingdom. The One who taps its power can forge the Kingdom's destiny.

Pip is only one pixel in a world full of 32-bit characters, yet he is the only one brave enough to face the Skeleton Queen and rescue the kidnapped princess.
